about_the_game:
Gear up for a 30-day adventure on the legendary Dnipro River with the Dnipro Delta Pack! This mighty river flows through the heart of Ukraine, home to Fishing Planet’s developers. Explore its tranquil sandy shores, wild reed thickets, and inviting fishing lodges.

Be among the first to experience freshwater trolling on the sleek Dnipro motorboat, equipped with two rod holders crafted specifically for trolling. You'll also receive two robust casting and spinning setups and a complete selection of lures designed to tackle the diverse species of the abundant Dnipro.

Express your style with a Ukrainian-themed outfit, and maximize your fishing success with 30 days of Premium for extra earnings and XP. The pack also includes expanded storage, a stylish rod case, and extra marker buoys, ensuring you have everything needed for an incredible journey on the Dnipro River!

Dnipro Delta Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 30-DAYS PREMIUM
* 5 Marker Buoys
* 50 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots


RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Trident Casting 7' 3" (220) - Length: 7' 3" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 1–3 Oz (28–85 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 12–55 Lb (7–25 kg); Action: Slow
* Black Needle 7' 6" (230) - Length: 7' 6" (2.3 m); Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz (18–56 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 24–60 Lb (11–27.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast

Reels:
* Molfar Pro 6500 - Ratio: 6.5; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/130 (0.5/130), Braid 30/225 (0.28/225); Max Drag: 50.7 Lb (23 kg); Brake: Centrifugal
* Scarlet Thread 7000 - Ratio: 5.1; Recovery: 47.2" (120 cm); Capacity: Mono 37/120 (0.6/120), Braid 36/215 (0.3/215); Max Drag: 56.2 Lb (25.5 kg); Drag: Front


TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m):
Braid .0096" (0.24 mm) - Test: 46 Lb (20.85 kg)
Braid .0108" (0.27 mm) - Test: 53 Lb (24 kg)
Mono .026" (0.65 mm) - Test: 50.7 Lb (23 kg)
Fluoro .028" (0.7 mm) - Test: 53 Lb (24 kg)

* Titanium Leader .012" (0.3) (x10) - Length: 1.64’; Test: 41 Lb (18.6 kg)
* Titanium Leader .012" (0.3) (x10) - Length: 0.82’; Test: 41 Lb (18.6 kg)
* Titanium Leader .014" (0.35) (x10) - Length: 1.64’; Test: 55.1 Lb (25.1 kg)
* Titanium Leader .014" (0.35) (x10) - Length: 0.82’; Test: 55.1 Lb (25.1 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .028" (0.7) (x10) - Length: 0.82’; Test: 53 Lb (24 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .028" (0.7) (x10) - Length: 1.64’; Test: 53 Lb (24 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .025" (0.65) (x10) - Length: 0.82’; Test: 44 Lb (20 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .025" (0.65) (x10) - Length: 1.64’; Test: 44 Lb (20 kg)

* Thorn JigHeads: 2 Oz. (56 g), #6/0 (x10); 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x5); 5/8 Oz. (18 g), #3/0 (x10); 1 1/16 Oz. (30 g), #4/0 (x5)
* Barbless Thorn JigHeads: 5/8 Oz. (18 g), #5/0 (x5); 1 1/16 Oz. (30 g), #5/0 (x5); 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #5/0 (x5); 2 Oz. (56 g), #5/0 (x5); 7/8 Oz.(25 g), #5/0 (x5)
* Crankbaits: 3 ft. (1 m), #3/0 (x2); 6 ft. (2 m), #3/0 (x2); 6 ft. (2 m), #4/0 (x2); 8 ft. (2.5 m), #4/0 (x2); 8 ft. (2.5 m), #5/0 (x2); 12 ft. (3.5 m), #6/0 (x2)
* Hunched Runners: 8 ft (2.5 m), #2/0 (x2); 3 ft (1 m), #4/0 (x2); 8 ft (2.5 m), #6/0 (x2)
* Triple Runners: 8 ft (2.5 m), #3/0 (x2); 3 ft (1 m), #4/0 (x2); 8 ft (2.5 m), #5/0 (x2)
* Twerky Runners: 16 ft (5 m), #3/0 (x2); 19 ft (6 m), #7/0 (x2); 23 ft (7 m), #7/0 (x2)
* Freaky Walkers 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0 (x6)
* Spoons: Cicada 5/8 Oz. (18 g), #3/0 (x3), Cicada 1 Oz. (28 g), #5/0 (x3), Cicada 1 1/4 Oz. (36 g), #7/0 (x3)
* Soft Baits: Bionic Slug 4.7" (12 cm) (x30), Shad 6" (15 cm) (x30), Grub 4" (10 cm) (x30)


EQUIPMENT
* Dnipro Motor Boat - Length: 14 ft 9″ (450 cm); Width: 6 ft 3″ (190 cm); Weight: 2390 Lb (1085 kg); Material: Aluminium; Passenger Capacity: 1; Engine: 75 hp; Echo Sounder: Unique; Rod Holders: 2 for spinning and casting rods; GPS: Yes; Detailing: High
* Dnipro Angler's Cap - Tackles: 3; Flashlight Slot: Yes
* Nightingale Fishing Jacket - Tackles: 30; Lines: 10
* Sahajdak Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 4; Lines: 2
* Garry Scott FishCitadel L Plus - Max Single Fish Weight: 220 Lb (100 kg); Total Fish Weight: 551 Lb (250 kg); Fish-Friendly: Yes


FISHING LICENSES (30 days):
* Advanced Ukraine License


POND PASSES (30 days):
* Dnipro River Pass

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Gear up for a 30-day adventure on the legendary Dnipro River with the Dnipro Delta Pack! This mighty river flows through the heart of Ukraine, home to Fishing Planet’s developers. Explore its tranquil sandy shores, wild reed thickets, and inviting fishing lodges.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
